SDG_GOAL: Goal: 7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.
SDG_TARGET: Target: 7.b. By 2030, expand infrastructure and upgrade technology for supplying modern and sustainable energy services for all in developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing states and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their respective programmes of support.
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator: 7.b.1: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing countries (in watts per capita)
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator is defined as the installed capacity of power plants that generate electricity from renewable energy sources divided by the total population of a country. Capacity is defined as the net maximum electrical capacity installed at the year-end and renewable energy sources are as defined in the IRENA Statute (see concepts below).
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal: 7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all.
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target: 7.b. By 2030, expand infrastructure and upgrade technology for supplying modern and sustainable energy services for all in developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing states and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their respective programmes of support.
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator: 7.b.1: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing countries (in watts per capita)

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 12: Établir des modes de consommation et de production durables
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 12.a: Aider les pays en développement à se doter des moyens scientifiques et technologiques qui leur permettent de s’orienter vers des modes de consommation et de production plus durables
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 12.a.1: Puissance installée du parc d’énergie renouvelable dans les pays en développement (en watts par habitant)(identique à l’indicateur proposé en remplacement de l’indicateur 7.b.1 ci-dessus)
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 12: Établir des modes de consommation et de production durables
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 12.a: Aider les pays en développement à se doter des moyens scientifiques et technologiques qui leur permettent de s’orienter vers des modes de consommation et de production plus durables
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicateur 12.a.1: Puissance installée du parc d’énergie renouvelable dans les pays en développement (en watts par habitant)(identique à l’indicateur proposé en remplacement de l’indicateur 7.b.1 ci-dessus)
